description.brazilian: Ah, quero dizer, "perfurante"
description.english: Oh, I mean "piercing"
description.french: Oh, je voulais dire « perçant »
description.german: Oh, ich meine "durchdringend"
description.italian: Oh, volevo dire "perforante"
description.japanese: ああ、突き刺すって意味だ

description.brazilian: Um rifle de precisão de tiro único, com foco em mana e movido a vapor, meu bem!
description.english: A single-shot, mana-focusing, steam-powered sniper rifle, baby!
description.french: Un fusil de précision à vapeur à un coup, concentrant le mana, bébé !
description.german: Ein einschüssiges, manafokussierendes, dampfbetriebenes Scharfschützengewehr, Baby!
description.italian: Un fucile di precisione a colpo singolo, concentrato sul mana e alimentato a vapore, tesoro!
description.japanese: 単発でマナを集中させる、蒸気動力のスナイパーライフルだ！
description.polish: Jednostrzałowy, skupiający manę, parowy karabin snajperski, skarbie!
description.russian: Однозарядная, манафокусирующая снайперская винтовка на паровом двигателе, детка!
description.schinese: 一把单发、聚焦法力、蒸汽驱动的狙击步枪，宝贝！
description.spanish: ¡Un rifle de francotirador de un solo disparo, que concentra el maná y funciona a vapor, cariño!
description.tchinese: 一把單發、聚焦魔力、蒸氣驅動的狙擊步槍，寶貝！
description.turkish: Tek atışlı, mana odaklı, buharla çalışan bir keskin nişancı tüfeği, bebeğim!

displayName.english: VolT is now on the team!
displayName.japanese: VoITがチームに加わったぞ！

description.brazilian: Às vezes, pode dar um pequeno choque elétrico...
description.english: Sometimes it can give a little electric shock...
description.french: Parfois, il peut donner une petite décharge électrique…
description.german: Manchmal kann es einen kleinen Stromschlag auslösen...
description.italian: A volte può dare una piccola scossa elettrica...
description.japanese: 時々、ちょっとした電撃を与えることもある…
description.polish: Czasami potrafi dać lekkie porażenie prądem...
description.schinese: 有时它会发出轻微的电击……
description.spanish: A veces puede dar una pequeña descarga eléctrica...
description.tchinese: 有時它會發出輕微的電擊…
description.turkish: Bazen hafif bir elektrik şoku verebiliyor...

displayName.brazilian: Recebi um poder que meu pai nunca sonhou!
displayName.english: I received power that my father never dreamed of!
displayName.french: J'ai reçu un pouvoir dont mon père n'aurait jamais rêvé !
displayName.german: Ich habe Kräfte erhalten, von denen mein Vater nie geträumt hätte!
displayName.italian: Ho ricevuto un potere che mio padre non avrebbe mai sognato!
displayName.japanese: 父が夢にも思わなかった力を得た！
displayName.polish: Otrzymałem moc, o jakiej mój ojciec nawet nie śnił!
displayName.russian: Я получил власть которая и не снилась моему отцу!
displayName.schinese: 我获得了父亲做梦也想不到的力量！
displayName.spanish: ¡Recibí un poder con el que mi padre nunca soñó!
displayName.tchinese: 我獲得了父親做夢也想不到的力量！
displayName.turkish: Babamın hayal bile edemeyeceği bir güce kavuştum!

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os 4 espaços de invocação
description.english: Unlock all 4 summon slots
description.french: Débloquez les 4 emplacements d'invocation
description.german: Schalte alle 4 Beschwörungsplätze frei
description.italian: Sblocca tutti e 4 gli slot di evocazione
description.japanese: 召喚スロットを4つ全てアンロックする
description.schinese: 解锁所有 4 个召唤槽
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有 4 個召喚槽

displayName.japanese: それで…世界は救われたのか？

description.brazilian: Quebre todas as 7 Fontes Primordiais
description.english: Break all 7 Primordial Sources
description.french: Brisez les 7 Sources Primordiales
description.german: Zerstöre alle 7 Urquellen
description.italian: Rompi tutte e 7 le Fonti Primordiali
description.japanese: 7つの原初の源泉を全て破壊する
description.schinese: 打破所有 7 个原始源泉
description.tchinese: 打破所有 7 個原始源泉

description.brazilian: Compre todos os power-ups
description.english: Buy all power-ups
description.french: Achetez tous les bonus
description.german: Kaufe alle Power-Ups
description.italian: Acquista tutti i potenziamenti
description.japanese: 全てのパワーアップを購入する

displayName.japanese: クリティカルヒーラー

description.brazilian: E ela também tem uma cauda extremamente sensível...
description.english: And she also has an overly sensitive tail...
description.french: Et elle a aussi une queue extrêmement sensible…
description.german: Und sie hat auch einen überempfindlichen Schwanz...
description.italian: E ha anche una coda ipersensibile...
description.japanese: それに、彼女は尻尾が敏感すぎる…
description.polish: A do tego ma nadwrażliwy ogon...
description.russian: А ещё у неё через-чур чувствительный хвостик...
description.schinese: 而且她还有一条过于敏感的尾巴……
description.spanish: Y también tiene una cola hipersensible...
description.tchinese: 而且她還有一條太敏感的尾巴…
description.turkish: Ayrıca aşırı hassas bir kuyruğu var...

description.brazilian: Não deixe as catgirls morrerem mais de 16 vezes do início ao fim do jogo.
description.english: Don't let the catgirls die more than 16 times from the beginning of the game to the end.
description.french: Ne laissez pas les filles-chats mourir plus de 16 fois du début à la fin du jeu.
description.german: Lass die Katzenmädchen vom Anfang bis zum Ende des Spiels nicht mehr als 16 Mal sterben.
description.italian: Non lasciare che le ragazze gatto muoiano più di 16 volte dall'inizio alla fine del gioco.
description.japanese: ゲーム開始から終了まで、猫娘を16回以上死なせないようにしろ。
description.polish: Nie pozwól dziewczynom-kotom zginąć więcej niż 16 razy od początku do końca gry.
description.russian: Не допустите от начала прохождения и до конца - смерти кошкодевочек более 16 раз
description.schinese: 从游戏开始到结束，不要让猫娘们死亡超过16次。
description.spanish: No dejes que las chicas gato mueran más de 16 veces desde el principio hasta el final del juego.
description.tchinese: 從遊戲開始到結束，不要讓貓娘們死超過 16 次。
description.turkish: Oyunun başından sonuna kadar kedi kızların 16 kereden fazla ölmesine izin verme.

description.brazilian: A conquista é concedida aos mais ágeis e manobráveis
description.english: The achievement is awarded to the most agile and nimble
description.french: Ce succès est décerné au plus agile et au plus vif
description.german: Dieser Erfolg geht an die Agilsten und Flinksten.
description.italian: Il traguardo viene assegnato alla più agile e svelta
description.japanese: この実績は、最も機敏で俊敏なプレイヤーに授与されます
description.polish: Osiągnięcie przyznawane jest najzwinniejszym i najzwinniejszym
description.russian: Достижение вручается самым ловким и проворным
description.schinese: 这项成就授予最敏捷、最灵活的人。
description.spanish: El logro se otorga al más ágil y ligero.
description.tchinese: 這項成就授予最敏捷、最靈巧的人。
description.turkish: Bu başarı en çevik ve çevik olana verilir.

description.brazilian: Zefir agora está com você! Mas... Será que ela vai se encontrar?
description.english: Zefir is now with you! But... Will she meet herself?
description.french: Zefir est maintenant avec vous ! Mais... Va-t-elle se rencontrer ?
description.german: Zefir ist jetzt bei dir! Aber... Wird sie sich selbst begegnen?
description.italian: Zefir ora è con te! Ma... incontrerà se stessa?
description.japanese: ゼフィールがあなたのもとへ！でも…彼女は自分自身に出会うのでしょうか？
description.polish: Zefir jest teraz z tobą! Ale... Czy spotka samą siebie?
description.russian: Зефир теперь с вами! Но... Встретиться ли она с собой?
description.schinese: 泽菲尔现在和你在一起了！但是……她会遇到自己吗？
description.spanish: ¡Zefir ya está contigo! Pero... ¿Se encontrará consigo misma?
description.tchinese: 澤菲爾現在和你在一起了！但是……她會和自己見面嗎？
description.turkish: Zefir artık seninle! Ama... Acaba kendisiyle karşılaşacak mı?

displayName.japanese: なんて気持ち悪いんだ…

description.brazilian: Eu gosto!
description.english: I like it!
description.french: J'aime ça !
description.german: Gefällt mir!
description.italian: Mi piace!
description.japanese: いいね！

description.brazilian: Bem, você sente, certo?
description.english: Well, you feel it, right?
description.french: Eh bien, vous le sentez, n'est-ce pas ?
description.german: Na, du spürst es doch, oder?
description.italian: Beh, lo senti, vero?
description.japanese: そう、感じるでしょ？

displayName.schinese: 永远昏昏欲睡的科学家……
displayName.tchinese: 永遠昏昏欲睡的科學家…

description.brazilian: hrrrrrr...
description.english: hrrrrrr...
description.french: hrrrrrr...
description.german: hrrrrrr...
description.italian: hrrrrrr...
description.japanese: うぅぅぅ…

description.brazilian: Com medo? Não tenha medo! Eu sou um amigo!...
description.english: Scared? Don't be afraid! I'm a friend!...
description.french: Peur ? N'aie pas peur ! Je suis un ami !...
description.german: Angst? Keine Angst! Ich bin ein Freund!...
description.italian: Spaventata? Non aver paura! Sono un'amica!...
description.japanese: 怖い？怖がらないで！私は友達よ！…
description.polish: Wystraszony? Nie bój się! Jestem przyjacielem!...
description.schinese: 害怕了吗？别害怕！我是朋友！……
description.turkish: Korktun mu? Korkma! Ben bir arkadaşım!...

description.brazilian: Deixar mais de 50 catgirls morrerem... Horrível.
description.english: Allowing more than 50 catgirls to die... Horrible.
description.french: Laisser mourir plus de 50 catgirls... Horrible.
description.german: Mehr als 50 Katzenmädchen sterben lassen... Grauenhaft.
description.italian: Lasciare morire più di 50 ragazze gatto... Orribile.
description.japanese: 50人以上の猫娘を死なせてしまったなんて…ひどい。
description.schinese: 让超过50个猫娘死去……太可怕了。
description.spanish: Dejar morir a más de 50 chicas gato... Horrible.
description.tchinese: 眼睜睜看著50多個貓娘死去……太可怕了。
description.turkish: 50'den fazla kedi kızın ölmesine izin vermek... Korkunç.

description.brazilian: Agora você pode até comprar uma chave! E! E até algo mais...
description.english: Now you can even buy a key! And! And even something else...
description.french: Maintenant, vous pouvez même acheter une clé ! Et ! Et même autre chose...
description.german: etzt kannst du sogar einen Schlüssel kaufen! Und! Und noch etwas anderes...
description.italian: Ora puoi persino comprare una chiave! E! E anche qualcos'altro...
description.japanese: 今なら鍵も買えるよ！それに！他にも…
description.polish: Teraz możesz nawet kupić klucz! I! I jeszcze coś...
description.russian: Теперь ты можешь купить аж ключ! И! И даже ещё что-то...
description.schinese: 现在你甚至可以买钥匙了！还有！甚至还有其他东西……
description.spanish: ¡Ahora incluso puedes comprar una llave! ¡Y! Y algo más...
description.tchinese: 現在你甚至可以買鑰匙了！還有！甚至還有其他東西…
description.turkish: Artık bir anahtar bile alabilirsin! Ve! Ve hatta başka bir şey...

description.brazilian: Comece um novo "jogo plus"
description.english: Start a new "game plus"
description.french: Commencer un nouveau « jeu plus »
description.german: Starte ein neues "Spiel-Plus"
description.italian: Inizia un nuovo "gioco plus"
description.japanese: 新しい「ゲームプラス」を始める

description.brazilian: "Homens das cavernas, homens das cavernas - somos homens das cavernas orgulhosos!"
description.english: "Cavemen, cavemen - we are proud cavemen!"
description.french: « Hommes des cavernes, hommes des cavernes, nous sommes fiers d'être des hommes des cavernes ! »
description.german: "Höhlenmenschen, Höhlenmenschen – wir sind stolze Höhlenmenschen!"
description.italian: "Uomini delle caverne, uomini delle caverne - siamo orgogliosi uomini delle caverne!"
description.japanese: 「原始人よ、原始人よ ― 我々は誇り高き原始人だ！」
description.schinese: “穴居人，穴居人——我们是骄傲的穴居人！”
description.spanish: "¡Hombres de las cavernas, hombres de las cavernas, somos hombres de las cavernas orgullosos!"
description.tchinese: “穴居人，穴居人——我們是驕傲的穴居人！”
description.turkish: "Mağara adamları, mağara adamları - biz gururlu mağara adamlarıyız!"

description.brazilian: Bem... Tipo... Para desbloquear - suba na cabeça da Elisia no começo...
description.english: Well... Like... To unlock - stand on Elisia's head at the beginning...
description.french: Euh... Genre... Pour débloquer, montez sur la tête d'Elisia au début...
description.german: Na ja... Zum Freischalten: Stell dich am Anfang auf Elisias Kopf...
description.italian: Beh... Tipo... Per sbloccare - sali sulla testa di Elisia all'inizio...
description.japanese: えっと… 例えば… 最初にエリシアの頭の上に立つとアンロックされる…
description.polish: No cóż... Na przykład... Aby odblokować - stań na głowie Elisii na początku...
description.russian: Ну... Типа... Чтобы разблокировать - постой на голове Елисии в начале...
description.schinese: 嗯……比如……解锁方式——一开始站在艾丽西亚的头上……
description.spanish: Bueno... Como... Para desbloquear: párate sobre la cabeza de Elisia al principio...
description.tchinese: 嗯……比如……解鎖方式——一開始站在艾莉西亞的頭上……
description.turkish: Şey... Şöyle... Kilidi açmak için - başlangıçta Elisia'nın başının üzerinde dur...

displayName.brazilian: Mas ele era uma pessoa tão gentil...
displayName.english: But he was such a kind person...
displayName.french: Mais c'était une personne si gentille...
displayName.german: Aber er war so ein netter Mensch...
displayName.italian: Ma era una persona così gentile...
displayName.japanese: でも、彼はとても優しい人だった…
displayName.polish: Ale on był taką miłą osobą...
displayName.spanish: Pero era una persona tan amable...
displayName.turkish: Ama o çok nazik bir insandı...

description.brazilian: E você também pode montá-los
description.english: And you can also ride them
description.french: Et vous pouvez aussi les chevaucher
description.german: Und du kannst sie auch reiten
description.italian: E puoi anche cavalcarli
description.japanese: それに、エリシアに乗ることもできる
description.polish: I możesz na nich też jeździć
description.russian: А ещё на них можно кататься
description.tchinese: 而且你還可以騎著它們

description.brazilian: Complete o Novo Jogo Plus
description.english: Complete New Game Plus
description.french: Terminer le nouveau jeu plus
description.german: Schließe "Neues Spiel-Plus" ab
description.italian: Completa Nuovo Gioco Plus
description.japanese: ニューゲームプラスを完了する

description.brazilian: morreu...
description.english: died...
description.french: est morte...
description.german: gestorben...
description.italian: è morto...
description.japanese: が死んだ…

displayName.french: Il en reste encore la moitié !

description.brazilian: Quebre 3 Fontes Primordiais
description.english: Break 3 Primordial Sources
description.french: Briser 3 Sources Primordiales
description.german: Zerbrich 3 Urquellen
description.italian: Rompere le 3 Fonti Primordiali
description.japanese: 原始の源泉を3つ破壊する

displayName.japanese: ハバババババ クククク ヒュー
displayName.schinese: 哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈
displayName.tchinese: 哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈

description.brazilian: Cuide dela
description.english: Take care of her
description.french: Prends soin d'elle
description.german: Kümmere dich um sie
description.italian: Prenditi cura di lei
description.japanese: 彼女の面倒を見てやれ

displayName.brazilian: A Invocadora se juntou ao grupo!
displayName.english: The Summoner has joined the party!
displayName.german: Der Beschwörer ist mit von der Partie!
displayName.italian: L'Evocatore si è unito alla festa!
displayName.japanese: 召喚士がパーティーに加わった！
displayName.spanish: ¡La Invocadora se ha unido al grupo!

description.brazilian: Não a julgue com tanta severidade - ela tem patas!
description.english: Don't judge her too harshly - she's got paws!
description.french: Ne la juge pas trop sévèrement, elle a des pattes !
description.german: Verurteile sie nicht zu streng – sie hat Pfoten!
description.italian: Non giudicarla troppo severamente: ha le zampe!
description.japanese: 彼女をあまり厳しく見ないで ― 彼女には手があるんだから！
description.polish: Nie oceniaj jej zbyt surowo - ma łapy!
description.russian: Не суди строго - у неё лапки!
description.schinese: 别太苛刻地评判她——她有爪子！
description.spanish: No la juzgues con tanta dureza, ¡tiene patas!
description.turkish: Onu çok sert yargılama - patileri var!

description.brazilian: Bem... Algumas pessoas gostam...
description.english: Well... Some people like it...
description.french: Eh bien... Certaines personnes aiment ça...
description.german: Nun ja... Manche Leute mögen es...
description.italian: Beh... Ad alcuni piace...
description.japanese: まあ…好きな人もいるし…

description.brazilian: "Por que você tem tanta vergonha de garotas-gato?"
description.english: "Why are you so embarrassed by cat girls?"
description.french: « Pourquoi es-tu si gênée par les filles-chats ? »
description.german: „Warum schämst du dich so für Katzenmädchen?“
description.italian: "Perché le ragazze gatto ti imbarazzano così tanto?"
description.japanese: 「なんで猫娘にそんなに恥ずかしがるの？」
description.spanish: "¿Por qué te avergüenzan tanto las chicas gato?"

displayName.japanese: ザ・ワールド！…ああ…それは「アダージョ」だ！

description.brazilian: Não impeça o Tempai de tocar piano! Rrrr!
description.english: Don't stop Tempai from playing the piano! Rrrr!
description.french: N'empêche pas Tempai de jouer du piano ! Rrrr !
description.german: Halte Tempai nicht vom Klavierspielen ab! Rrrr!
description.italian: Non impedire a Tempai di suonare il pianoforte! Rrrr!
description.japanese: テンパイのピアノ演奏を止めないで！ルルル！
description.polish: Nie przeszkadzaj Tempai'emu grać na pianinie! Rrrr!
description.russian: Не мешай Темпай играть на пианине! Рррр!
description.spanish: ¡No le impidas a Tempai tocar el piano! ¡Rrrr!
description.tchinese: 別阻止 Tempai 彈鋼琴！呼呼！

description.brazilian: Até os créditos finais têm uma conquista! E você?
description.english: Even the end credits have an achievement! Do you?
description.french: Même le générique de fin a un exploit ! Et vous ?
description.german: Sogar der Abspann enthält eine Errungenschaft! Und du?
description.italian: Anche i titoli di coda hanno un traguardo! E tu?
description.japanese: エンドクレジットにも実績がある！君は？
description.polish: Nawet napisy końcowe mają osiągnięcie! A ty?
description.russian: Даже у финальных титров есть достижение! А у тебя?
description.schinese: 就连片尾字幕都有成就！你有吗？
description.spanish: ¡Hasta los créditos finales tienen un logro! ¿Y tú?
description.tchinese: 連片尾字幕都有成就！你有嗎？
description.turkish: Son jenerikte bile bir başarı var! Sende var mı?

description.brazilian: Até a Singularidade tinha medo dele...
description.english: Even the Singularity was afraid of him...
description.french: Même la Singularité avait peur de lui...
description.german: Sogar die Singularität hatte Angst vor ihm...
description.italian: Persino la Singolarità aveva paura di lui...
description.japanese: 特異点でさえ彼を恐れていた…
description.spanish: Hasta la Singularidad le tenía miedo...

description.brazilian: Mate tudo que se move. Exceto as catgirls!
description.english: Kill everything that moves. Except catgirls!
description.french: Tuer tout ce qui bouge. Sauf les catgirls !
description.german: Töte alles, was sich bewegt. Außer Katzenmädchen!
description.italian: Uccidi tutto ciò che si muove. Tranne le ragazze gatto!
description.japanese: 動くもの全てを殺せ。猫娘以外！
description.polish: Zabij wszystko, co się rusza. Poza dziewczynami-kotami!
description.russian: Убивайте всё что движеться. Кроме кошкодевочек!
description.schinese: 杀死所有会动的东西。除了猫娘！
description.spanish: ¡Mata a todo lo que se mueva! ¡Excepto a las chicas gato!
description.tchinese: 殺死所有會動的東西。除了貓娘！
description.turkish: Hareket eden her şeyi öldür. Kedi kızlar hariç!

displayName.brazilian: Você está satisfeito? Valeu a pena?
displayName.english: Are you satisfied? Was it worth it?
displayName.french: Êtes-vous satisfait ? Ça en valait la peine ?
displayName.german: Bist du zufrieden? War es das wert?
displayName.italian: Sei soddisfatto? Ne è valsa la pena?
displayName.japanese: 満足したか？価値はあったか？

description.brazilian: O que ele fez com você? Ele acelerou...
description.english: What did he do to you? He sped up...
description.french: Que vous a-t-il fait ? Il a accéléré...
description.german: Was hat er dir angetan? Er hat beschleunigt...
description.italian: Cosa ti ha fatto? Ha accelerato...
description.japanese: 彼は何をした？彼はスピードを上げた…
description.schinese: 他对你做了什么？他加速了……
description.tchinese: 他對你做了什麼？他加速了…
